inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Count of all my Azure resources

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
// Count of all resources
resources
| where  type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| summarize Servers=count()

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type in ('microsoft.hybridcompute/machines')
| extend
    OSName = iff( type  == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', tostring(properties.osProfile.computerName), tostring((properties.extended.instanceView).computerName)),
    OSType = iff( type  == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', tostring(properties.osName), tolower(tostring((properties.storageProfile).osDisk.osType))),
    OSsku = iff( type  == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', tostring(properties.osSku), tostring((properties.extended.instanceView).osName)),
    ServerStatus = iff( type  == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', tostring(properties.status), tostring((properties.extended.instanceView).powerState.displayStatus))
//| where OSType in ('windows')
|project  OSName, OSType, OSsku, ServerStatus
|summarize count () by OSsku
| order by OSsku desc

partHeader.title: Arc enabled Windows Servers by OS types

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Count of all my Azure resources

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type in ('microsoft.hybridcompute/machines')
| extend
    OSType = iff( type  == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', tostring(properties.osName), tolower(tostring((properties.storageProfile).osDisk.osType))),
    OSsku = iff( type  == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', tostring(properties.osSku), tostring((properties.extended.instanceView).osName))
|project   OSType, OSsku
|summarize count () by OSType

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Arc properties

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type in ('microsoft.hybridcompute/machines')
| extend
    OSName = iff( type  == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', tostring(properties.osProfile.computerName), tostring((properties.extended.instanceView).computerName)),
    OSType = iff( type  == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', tostring(properties.osName), tolower(tostring((properties.storageProfile).osDisk.osType))),
    OSsku = iff( type  == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', tostring(properties.osSku), tostring((properties.extended.instanceView).osName)),
    ServerStatus = iff( type  == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', tostring(properties.status), tostring((properties.extended.instanceView).powerState.displayStatus))
|project  OSName, OSType, OSsku, ServerStatus
|summarize count () by ServerStatus

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 2

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
Resources
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project subscriptionId, subscriptionName = name)
    on subscriptionId
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
 |extend    
    CloudProviders=properties.detectedProperties.cloudprovider
| project subscriptionName,properties.osProfile.computerName, location,CloudProviders , resourceGroup
|summarize count() by subscriptionName,  location, resourceGroup
| order by ['location'] asc

partHeader.title: High Level overview
partHeader.subtitle: Arc-enabled Servers count by Subscription, Region, and resource groups

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Count of all my Azure resources

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
AdvisorResources
| where type == 'microsoft.advisor/recommendations'
| where properties.category == 'HighAvailability'
| where properties.shortDescription.solution == 'Upgrade to the latest version of the Azure Connected Machine agent'
| project
		id,
		JoinId = toupper(properties.resourceMetadata.resourceId),
		machineName = tostring(properties.impactedValue),
		agentVersion = tostring(properties.extendedProperties.installedVersion),
		expectedVersion = tostring(properties.extendedProperties.latestVersion)
| join kind=leftouter(
	Resources
	| where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
	| project
		machineId = toupper(id),
		status = tostring (properties.status)
	) on $left.JoinId == $right.machineId
| where status != 'Expired'
| summarize count () by agentVersion, expectedVersion

partHeader.title: Outdated Arc Agent
partHeader.subtitle: Azure Connected machine agents need updating

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 6

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
//Total Count of  Windows 2012 and 2012R2 servers that ESU eligible 
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend 
    ESU_EligibleServers = properties.osName,
    OSsku = properties.osSku
| where ESU_EligibleServers == 'windows' and OSsku like  "Windows Server 2012"
|project ESU_EligibleServers
|summarize ESU_EligibleServers=count()

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: ESU not assigned vm Count

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
// Count of Windows Server 2012 and R2 servers that have ESU assigned vs un-assigned
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend 
    OSType = properties.osName,
    OSsku = properties.osSku,
    OSName = properties.osProfile.computerName,
    Server_Count= properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState
| where OSType == 'windows' and OSsku like  "Windows Server 2012"
|where Server_Count =="Assigned"
//|project  OSName, ESU_Enabled,OSsku, OSType
|project  OSName, OSsku, Server_Count 
//comment out the next line to get list of servers that do not have ESU assigned / enabled
|summarize Server_Count=count()

partHeader.title: ESU Enabled Servers
partHeader.subtitle: Number of Windows 2012/R2 Servers ESU activated on

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: ESU not assigned vm Count

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
// Count of Windows Server 2012 and R2 servers that have ESU assigned vs un-assigned
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend 
    OSType = properties.osName,
    OSsku = properties.osSku,
    OSName = properties.osProfile.computerName,
    Server_Count= properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState
| where OSType == 'windows' and OSsku like  "Windows Server 2012"
|where Server_Count =="NotAssigned"
//|project  OSName, ESU_Enabled,OSsku, OSType
|project  OSName, OSsku, Server_Count 
//comment out the next line to get list of servers that do not have ESU assigned / enabled
|summarize Server_Count=count()

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Total ESU Enabled Cores

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
// Count of Windows Server 2012 and R2 servers cores that have ESU assigned vs un-assigned
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend 
    OSType = properties.osName,
    OSsku = properties.osSku,
    Server_Count= properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState,
    VMCores = toint(properties.detectedProperties.coreCount)
| where OSType == 'windows' and OSsku like  "Windows Server 2012"
|where Server_Count =="NotAssigned"
|summarize  Total_ESU_NOT_Enabled_Cores=sum(VMCores)

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Total ESU Enabled Cores

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
// Count of Windows Server 2012 and R2 servers cores that have ESU assigned vs un-assigned
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend 
    OSType = properties.osName,
    OSsku = properties.osSku,
    Server_Count= properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState,
    VMCores = toint(properties.detectedProperties.coreCount)
| where OSType == 'windows' and OSsku like  "Windows Server 2012"
|where Server_Count =="Assigned"
|summarize  Total_ESU_Enabled_Cores=sum(VMCores)

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 6

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend 
    OSType = properties.osName,
    OSsku = properties.osSku
| where OSType == 'windows' and OSsku like  "Windows Server 2012"
|summarize count () by tostring (OSsku)
| order by ['OSsku'] asc

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: Query 1

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
resources
| where type in ('microsoft.hybridcompute/licenses')
|extend
LicenseNames = name,
LicType= properties.licenseType=="ESU",
LicenseState = properties.licenseDetails.state,
target = properties.licenseDetails.target,
Licensed_Edition = properties.licenseDetails.edition,
Licensed_type = properties.licenseDetails.type,
LicensedCores = properties.licenseDetails.processors,
assignedLicenses = properties.licenseDetails.assignedLicenses
|project  LicenseNames,LicenseState, LicensedCores,Licensed_Edition,Licensed_type

inputs.name: partTitle
inputs.value: braken down by hostType  OS Edition, and ESU License Edition

inputs.name: query
inputs.value:
// Count of Windows Server 2012 and R2 servers braken down by hostType (Virtual/pCores), OS Edition, and ESU License Edition
resources
| where type == "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines"
| extend 
    Hostname =  properties.osProfile.computerName,
    OSType = properties.osName,
    OSsku = properties.osSku,
    ESU_Licensed_State= properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.licenseAssignmentState,
    ServerEdition = properties.licenseProfile.esuProfile.serverType,
    VMCores = toint(properties.detectedProperties.coreCount),
    HostType = properties.detectedProperties.model
| where OSType == 'windows' and OSsku like  "Windows Server 2012"
|project  Hostname , OSsku,  ESU_Licensed_State,ServerEdition, HostType
//comment the next line to get ComputerNames
| summarize count() by  tostring(  ESU_Licensed_State), tostring(HostType), tostring(ServerEdition)
